articles.description: New data reveals hate incidents against Asians and Asian Americans are still on the rise despite anti-hate public awareness campaigns.
articles.content:
Asian Americans have been victims of increased violence and harassment since the coronavirus pandemic began, but recent attacks have prompted some to "hunker down" again.
